channel.title: Sixty Days Six App Shipments Challenge on PB
channel.description: Recent content in Sixty Days Six App Shipments Challenge on PB

item.title: Making of my first Android App
item.description: It is 11:30 in the morning, I didn’t sleep the whole night. But, I am not sleepy. I am happy. I just finished with my first app of this vacation. I know I had taken the sixty days, six app shipments challenge but I am just finished with my first app, and it is already thirty days. More on it later. Few FAQs on the app now. Name of the app?

item.title: Day 2
item.description: Last day was not very productive. Downloaded Android SDK platforms for all the versions, was more than a GB in size and with my internet speed, it took me all night. After the download was complete, setting up Android SDK was a real pain in the ass. Six months ago, I had so much trouble in setting it up in Windows, I thought Linux would be better, but it is as much pain as it was in Windows.

item.title: Day 1
item.description: I am two days late. But to be fair, I reached home just day before yesterday after a long 29 hours train journey. Also, I did not have a proper internet connection for the past two days.Â After a lot of brainstorming for ideas, I am finally starting work on one of the ideas. Not a great idea, but the main reason for working on it is, I will get to learn so much!

item.title: Sixty Days, Six App Shipments Challenge
item.description: Sixty days of summer. Sixty days of no college, no assignments, no studies. Sixty Days of learning and coding. What more can one ask for? :) Since I am not doing any internship or any summer course, I have sixty days with me, and I can do anything I want to in these two months. Surely, not going to be lazying around. I won’t get this huge amount of free time again.
